title: DDG Zhang underscores importance of implementing MC12 outcomes, other trade agreements
description: Speaking at a workshop on 4 November held at the Foreign Trade University (FTU) in Hanoi, a member of the WTO Chairs Programme, Deputy Director-General Xiangchen Zhang highlighted the importance of putting into practice WTO decisions and agreements, in particular those adopted at the 12th Ministerial Conference (MC12) earlier this year.
